analysis.description:
TTCoin (/unique_chucks/17/0xd59b961d5be7ae59486cf4431cbd5534c9ef4f0d.sol#57-173) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/17/0xd59b961d5be7ae59486cf4431cbd5534c9ef4f0d.sol#98-109)

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/17/0xd59b961d5be7ae59486cf4431cbd5534c9ef4f0d.sol:
	Contract TTCoin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/17/0xd59b961d5be7ae59486cf4431cbd5534c9ef4f0d.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
